jobDescription:
What You'll Do

Design, build, and maintain enterprise-grade Java applications
Develop scalable microservices using Spring, Hibernate, and modern Java frameworks
Own features end-to-end, from requirements to deployment
Optimize application performance, ensure high availability, and solve real-world tech challenges
Contribute to CI/CD, clean code practices, and automation
Tech Stack & Skills

Java, Spring Boot, Hibernate, REST APIs, JDBC
Solid understanding of OOPs, design patterns, MVC, and JVM internals
Experience with MySQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch
Familiar with Git, Maven/Gradle, CI/CD tools
Bonus: Kafka, Redis, Aerospike, Play Framework

generatedQuestions.question: Introduce yourself
Tell me about your project
Can you describe your experience with Spring Boot and how you have used it in your projects?
What was your role in the development of the AdvocateBook project?
Can you explain how you implemented OAuth 2.0 in your applications?
What challenges did you face while integrating Spring with ELK stack?
What are the key features of the microservices architecture you have worked with?
How do you ensure the performance and scalability of your applications?
Can you explain the role of Dependency Injection in Spring?
What is the significance of using Circuit Breaker in microservices?
How do you handle errors in your Spring Boot applications?
Can you explain the difference between REST and SOAP APIs?
How would you compare Spring Boot with other Java frameworks you have used?
What are some common design patterns you have utilized in your projects?
Can you describe a situation where you had to troubleshoot a performance issue in an application?
How would you approach optimizing a slow-running query in MySQL?
What steps do you take to ensure clean code practices in your projects?
How do you manage version control in your projects?
Can you discuss a project where you implemented CI/CD practices?
What is your experience with using Git and CI/CD tools?
How do you prioritize tasks when working on multiple projects?
What do you think are the most important soft skills for a software developer?
How do you stay updated with new technologies and industry trends?
What are your career goals in the next 3-5 years?
Do you have any questions for us?
What motivates you to work in software development?
